history.proof: intros A T f x n Hx Hf. induction n. - apply domok_single. auto. - simpl. qsimpl time: 1 use: power,domok_concat,Map.

ctx: intros A T f x n Hx Hf.
exceptions.tactic: apply domok_concat with (x := power (Map A) f x n).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set T : mEnsemble A f : Map A -> Map A x : Map A n : nat Hx : T x Hf : def_ok_app A T f IHn : prechain_dom_ok A T (iteres A f x n) Unable to unify "prechain_dom_ok A ?M1868 (concat A ?M1869 (power (Map A) f x n))" with "prechain_dom_ok A T match iteres A f x n with | @single _ y => concat A (single A y) (f y) | @concat _ z y => concat A (concat A z y) (f y) end".

ctx: intros A T f x n Hx Hf.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Set) (T : mEnsemble A) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), T x -> def_ok_app A T f -> prechain_dom_ok A T (iteres A f x n)

Premises:
iteres : forall A : Set, (Map A -> Map A) -> Map A -> nat -> prechain A
def_ok_app : forall A : Set, mEnsemble A -> (Map A -> Map A) -> Prop
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula For GFormula: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For TT: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For FF: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For X: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
prechain_dom_ok : forall A : Set, mEnsemble A -> prechain A -> Prop
Inductive Map (A : Type) : Type := M0 : Map A | M1 : ad -> A -> Map A | M2 : Map A -> Map A -> Map A For Map: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M0: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
mEnsemble = fun A : Set => Map A -> Prop : Set -> Type Argument scope is [type_scope]
power_def_ok : forall (A : Set) (T : mEnsemble A) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), def_ok_app A T f -> T x -> T (power (Map A) f x n)
iteres_def_ok : forall (A : Set) (T : mEnsemble A) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n k : nat), def_ok_app A T f -> T (power (Map A) f x n) -> T (power (Map A) f x (n + k))
iteres_eq_0 : forall (A : Set) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), prechain_last A (iteres A f x n) = power (Map A) f x n
domok_concat : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (p : prechain A), T x -> prechain_dom_ok A T p -> prechain_dom_ok A T (concat A p x)
domok_single : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A), T x -> prechain_dom_ok A T (single A x)
prechain_dom_ok_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : mEnsemble A -> prechain A -> Prop), (forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A), T x -> P T (single A x)) -> (forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (p : prechain A), T x -> prechain_dom_ok A T p -> P T p -> P T (concat A p x)) -> forall (m : mEnsemble A) (p : prechain A), prechain_dom_ok A m p -> P m p
iteres_ult_const_4 : forall (A : Set) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), non_dist_chain A (iteres A f x n) -> exists p : nat, S p <= n /\ power (Map A) f x p = power (Map A) f x (S p)
iteres_eq : forall (A : Set) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), iteres A f x n = iteres_0 A f x n
chain_concat_s : forall (A : Set) (x y : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> T y -> r x y -> chain A T r (concat A (single A x) y)
chain_single : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> chain A T r (single A x)
chain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : mEnsemble A -> mRelation A -> prechain A -> Prop), (forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> P T r (single A x)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> T y -> r x y -> P T r (concat A (single A x) y)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T y -> r x y -> chain A T r (concat A z x) -> P T r (concat A z x) -> P T r (concat A (concat A z x) y)) ->...-> P m m0 p
chain_concat_m : forall (A : Set) (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T y -> r x y -> chain A T r (concat A z x) -> chain A T r (concat A (concat A z x) y)
lazy_power_eg_power_0 : forall (A : Set) (egalite : Map A -> Map A -> bool) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), (forall a b : Map A, egalite a b = true <-> a = b) -> forall z : Map A, (lazy_power_aux A egalite f x n = flag_true A z -> z = power (Map A) f x n /\ z = f z) /\ (lazy_power_aux A egalite f x n = flag_false A z -> z = power (Map A) f x n)
lazy_power_eg_power : forall (A : Set) (egalite : Map A -> Map A -> bool) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), (forall a b : Map A, egalite a b = true <-> a = b) -> lazy_power A egalite f x n = power (Map A) f x n
Inductive chain (A : Set) : mEnsemble A -> mRelation A -> prechain A -> Prop := chain_single : forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> chain A T r (single A x) | chain_concat_s : forall (x y : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> T y -> r x y ->...-> chain A T r (concat A (concat A z x) y) For chain: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _] For chain_single: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _] For chain_concat_s: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _ _ _ _] For chain_concat_m: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _]
chain_def_ok : forall (A : Set) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), chain A T r p -> prechain_dom_ok A T p
iteres_last : forall (A : Set) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat) (y : prechain A) (z : Map A), iteres A f x n = concat A y z -> z = f (prechain_last A y)
pre_domok_incr_chain : forall (A : Set) (p : prechain A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), prechain_dom_ok A T p /\ prechain_incr A r p -> chain A T r p
MapFlag_sum : forall (A : Set) (f : MapFlag A), exists x : Map A, f = flag_true A x \/ f = flag_false A x
chain_incr : forall (A : Set) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), chain A T r p -> prechain_incr A r p
MapCollect_as_Fold : forall (A B : Type) (f : ad -> A -> Map B) (m : Map A), MapCollect A B f m = MapFold A (Map B) (M0 B) (MapMerge B) f m
MapSweep_semantics_1 : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), MapSweep A f m = Some (a, y) -> f a y = true
dist_chain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Prop), (forall x : Map A, P (single A x)) -> (forall x y : Map A, x <> y -> P (concat A (single A x) y)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), x <> y -> dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> P (concat A z x) -> P (concat A (concat A z x) y)) -> forall p : prechain A, dist_chain A p -> P p
incr_concat : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (r : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), r (prechain_last A p) x -> prechain_incr A r p -> prechain_incr A r (concat A p x)
MapSweep_semantics_2 : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), MapSweep A f m = Some (a, y) -> MapGet A m a = Some y

```coq
intros A T f x n Hx Hf.
induction n.
- apply domok_single. assumption.
- simpl.
  apply domok_concat with (x := power (Map A) f x n).
  + apply power_def_ok with (n := n); assumption.
  + apply IHn.
    apply def_ok_app_ind with (P := fun T p => prechain_dom_ok A T p).
    * intros x' T'. intros. apply domok_single. assumption.
    * intros x' T' p'. intros. apply domok_concat; assumption.
    * assumption.
Qed.

original: intros A T f x n Hx Hf. induction n. - apply domok_single. auto. - simpl. apply domok_concat with (x := power (Map A) f x n). + apply power_def_ok with (n := n); auto. + apply IHn. apply def_ok_app_ind with (P := fun T p => prechain_dom_ok A T p). * intros x' T'. intros. apply domok_single. auto. * intros x' T' p'. intros. apply domok_concat; auto. * auto.
